## Today's lab 

- Please fill out the [office hour survey](https://forms.gle/j7nF9fx8syrADuK77)

- Make sure you 
  - Have RStudio installed and configured with GitHub
  - Can knit to PDF

- Clone the **hw-01** repo and put your name in the YAML. Knit, Commit, and push to GitHub. If you can do this, your installation and configuration are good to go!

- Let the TAs know if you don't see the **hw-01** repos or have questions.
